Package com.intellij.openapi.vcs.actions

Interface ActiveAnnotationGutter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EditorGutterAction, TextAnnotationGutterProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:

extends TextAnnotationGutterProvider, EditorGutterAction
